code: export const formatDate=dateString=>{const options={year:"numeric",month:"long",day:"numeric"};const date=new Date(dateString);const formattedDate=date.toLocaleDateString("en-US",options);const hour=date.getHours();const minutes=date.getMinutes();const period=hour>=12?"PM":"AM";const formattedTime=`${hour%12}:${minutes.toString().padStart(2,"0")} ${period}`;return`${formattedDate} | ${formattedTime}`;};
